docs.title: OrionFrame
docs.text:
Welcome to the OrionFrame documentation.

OrionFrame is a cross-platform Python Web Based GUI framework powered by Rust.

docs.title: API Reference
docs.text: The following functions are currently available in OrionFrame.

docs.title: Usage Guide
docs.text: This guide explains how to install, configure, and use OrionFrame in your projects.

docs.title: 🛠 Setup for Development
docs.text:
1. Clone the repository: bash git clone https://github.com/YellowSiC/orionframe.git cd orionframe

  2. Install dependencies: bash pip install maturin pytest

  3. Build the Rust extension in development mode: bash maturin develop

  4. Run tests: bash pytest -v
